body: @drstar you say gross on NTR doujin, I say you're gross for being into GEI and LOLI SHT -100/1

Well after reading all ppatta’s comics. I’m gonna buy their works on Gumroad to feel less dirty….
And you should too, because I want more… 
http://gumroad.com/ppatta

I am the writer of this cartoon.
I sat down and drew a cartoon for a month to draw this one.
And it takes about 10 hours to change the letters after paying 15 to 18 dollars per language for translation.
I have asked this site to delete it by countless emails, but they are ignoring it.
I don't know what to do anymore.
Please buy it officially and watch it.

 http://gumroad.com/ppatta

after reading the comments below, I went and checked out the artist's Twitter and found official sources. for people who speak jp/eng and want to support ppatta, you can go to https://ppatta.gumroad.com as an alt to fanbox.cc.
honestly ppatta's works are priced so low that they're basically a steal, so please support the author if you can!!! busting a nut while supporting the author through their insanely reasonably priced works? feelsgoodman

you can find the artists Twitter account! 
just search his/her name on twitter and then you'll find links to support the artist like I did but only one's coz I'm just a student.

This comic was released two days ago, the artist literally is contemplating stopping making them because there are no returns for all their hard work.

The artist is a smaller, independent creator whose income largely depends on the amount of fans subscribed to his fanbox.

Support official art here:
https://www.fanbox.cc/@ppatta2

They released a new statement saying that they are tired of their stuff getting leaked all over sites like these especially when this comic isn't even a week old yet. Their saying that they might stop official english translations and even overseas operations.

I don't want to be a hypocrite so I pay for all of the comics I read from Ppatta, the only reason I added this to my favorites was so that I can send the link to the artist and also check up on when it gets taken down.

This isn't to pick a fight, please support the author because they deserve to be supported. Sorry for the rant.
hey SomOr, better yet why don’t you post where we can find Ppatta so we can go support them? Instead of complaining yet enjoying content here?
▼▼▼hey comment below me, by your logic, everything here should be removed then? Quite a hypocrite of you being here and reading these ripped off and illegal translation.▼▼▼

I don't want to be 'that' person, but please take this down. The author works really hard for these and seeing their stuff posted on here without their consent or approval is sad. Support the author if you can and please don't distribute their stuff.

Ppatta might drawing these stories if they don't get any benefit for their hard work.
